shrimp.name: AshikhminShirley
shrimp.author: rconstruct
shrimp.usage: Based on Peter Stuart's implementation of the Ashikhmin-Shirley shading model. Samples the environment according to the number of ray samples. Notice that the more samples you use, the longer it takes to render. The parameters "Nu" and "Nv" control the specularity of the anisotropy direction along X, and Y respectively, being the parameter "xdir", the anisotropy direction, which defaults to "dPdu". This block passes the resulting values to the "aov_surfacecolor", "aov_diffuse", "aov_specularcolor", "aov_specular", and "aov_reflection" AOV presets.
